name: Brickout (itch) (MichaelMXY)
description:
___What are the controls to your game? How do we play?___

Player1 use mouse to move the paddle

player2 use keyboard (A and D) to move the paddle 2

  ___What creative additions did you make? How can we find them?___

1.Background music 

2.the sound when the ball hit the brick

3.background color

4.Second player

5.ball trail

Other things followed the tutorial on "Game Design, Prototyping, and Development 3rd Edition.
